price: Um dia, em que alma nenhuma nada poderá fazer por outra alma. E a ordem, nesse dia, será de Allah.
arabic: يَوۡمَ لَا تَمۡلِكُ نَفۡسٞ لِّنَفۡسٖ شَيۡـٔٗاۖ وَٱلۡأَمۡرُ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلَّهِ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: yawma lā tamliku nafsun linafsin shayan wal-amru yawma-idhin lillahi
